.. code-block:: bash

   Usage: lib_fake_registry.py [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...
   
     test winreg functions on a fake registry on windows and linux, without
     messing up Your real registry
   
   Options:
     --version   Show the version and exit.
     -h, --help  Show this message and exit.
   
   Commands:
     info  get program informations
